articles.description: Amazon, Apple and Facebook gave dire warnings about the rise in Covid-19 cases and potential civil unrest following next week's presidential election.
articles.content:
Tech companies had more to report Thursday night than the billions in profits they generated last quarter.
They also painted a dire picture of the world as we head into the winter months with Covid-… [+3372 chars]

articles.author: David Pan
articles.title: China Should Take Part in Creating Global Regulatory Framework for Digital Currency, Xi Says - CoinDesk
articles.description: China's president said the nation should proactively participate in setting the international framework.

articles.author: Megan DeMatteo
articles.title: Here's how much debt the average 20-something has—see how you compare - CNBC
articles.description: New Experian data finds consumers in their 20s and 30s have up to $27,251 in credit card, auto loans and student loan debt. See how you compare.
articles.content:
Debt is part of the average American's life, and you can start to accumulate it as young as your 20s.
New findings from Experian's 2020 State of Credit report show that the average Gen Z consumer (a… [+5630 chars]
